title: You can save a fantastic $800 on a 2TB iPad Pro
content:
Macworld

An iPad Pro, no matter the generation, is a great investment because it provides solid performance. So when we found the iPad Pro 4th Gen available for a mere $1,299 at Best Buy, down from its usual $2,099 MSRP, we knew we had to sound the alarm.

This particular iPad Pro features a powerful M2 chip and a jaw-dropping 2TB of storage space. That makes this tablet a fantastic choice for professionals and creatives, as well as anyone else who wants quality gear. Did we mention this is the Wi-Fi + Cellular model? Because that makes it an even better choice for all those times when you’re on the go.

The iPad Pro features an 11-inch Liquid Retina display with incredible visuals and great performance. Whether you’re editing videos, playing games, or just relaxing on Netflix, you’ll have a great time. The powerhouse processor this tablet is equipped with is designed for intense multitasking and demanding applications.

Now’s your chance to save $800 on an iPad Pro at Best Buy, so hurry up and add it to your cart before the deal runs out.

The 2TB iPad Pro 4th Gen is only $1299 right now
Get it at Best Buy
